title: Sure, here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 that address issues in experiment reproducibility in the context of machine learning

container-title: **"Reproducibility in Machine Learning: A Case Study"** - ICML Reproducibility Workshop

title: **"Reproducibility in Natural Language Processing: A Case Study of Parsing"**
**"The Importance of Reproducibility in Machine Learning"**

container-title: **"Reproducibility in Machine Learning: Challenges and Solutions"** - ICML

title: **"Reproducibility in Natural Language Processing: A Case Study of Text Classification"**
**"Reproducibility in Machine Learning: A Survey"** - arXiv
**"Reproducibility in Machine Learning: A Case Study of Image Classification"**
**"Reproducibility in Natural Language Processing: A Case Study of Named Entity Recognition"**
**"Reproducibility in Machine Learning: A Case Study of Reinforcement Learning"**

container-title: **"Reproducibility in Natural Language Processing: A Case Study of Machine Translation"** - ACL

title: **"Reproducibility in Machine Learning: A Case Study of Generative Adversarial Networks"**
**"Reproducibility in Natural Language Processing: A Case Study of Sentiment Analysis"**
**"Reproducibility in Machine Learning: A Case Study of Transfer Learning"**
**"Reproducibility in Natural Language Processing: A Case Study of Question Answering"**
**"Reproducibility in Machine Learning: A Case Study of Federated Learning"**
These articles cover a range of topics within the broader issue of reproducibility in ML and NLP, including case studies, surveys, and recommendations for improving reproducibility in these fields
